arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss on whether Thelo Aasgaard exit affected side at Peterborough United
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney refused to blame Thelo Aasgaard's departure on Wigan Athletic's underperformance across the board as they crashed 1-0 at struggling Peterborough United.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic confirm Thelo Aasgaard sale to Luton Town
arts.sum: Thelo Aasgaard is now a Luton Town player after the Championship strugglers met the buy-out clause in his Wigan Athletic contract.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic suffer setback at Peterborough United
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic drew another blank in front of goal as they slumped to a disappointing 1-0 defeat at League One strugglers Peterborough United.

arts.ttl: Mahamadou Susoho celebrates first goal for Peterborough in Wigan win
arts.sum: Peterborough took the lead after 19 minutes when Tayo Edun’s cross from the left was met by a diving header from Manchester City loanee Susoho.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic respond to transfer offer for Sunderland and Arsenal target
arts.sum: The Latics have received a transfer offer from the Championship, and they have delivered their answer.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic star set for switch to Luton Town
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic look set to lose the services of talisman Thelo Aaasgaard with Championship strugglers Luton Town having made their move.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss drops huge transfer window hint - and makes Liverpool loanee admission
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic chief Shaun Maloney is hoping to be nothing more than an interested spectator between now and the transfer deadline.

arts.ttl: Luton Town near £3m deal for Wigan Athletic star
arts.sum: Luton Town are closing on a deal for Wigan Athletic star Thelo Aasgaard with further talks and a… The post Luton Town near £3m deal for Wigan Athletic star appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss makes 'fly up the table' admission ahead of Peterborough United trip
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney believes Wigan Athletic's midweek trip to Peterborough United will be end-to-end entertainment.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Two changes in our expected team v Peterborough United!
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start at Peterborough United on Tuesday night.
